alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 3:52AM CDT until September 19 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cass County in west central Illinois... Central Schuyler County in west central Illinois... Southwestern Mason County in central Illinois... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 352 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rushville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Beardstown and Browning around 405 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bluff Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
